name: Panzerstrike
description:
A tiny platformer where you play as a tiny tank that can't jump.

Luckily for you, your tank is equipped with a grappling hook which you can use to gain height by swinging back and forth.

This is my entry for the GMTK jam 2018, I really enjoyed working on this and I feel like the idea has a lot of potential, maybe I'll turn it into a full project at some point.

Hope you have fun and had a great time jamming.

The song used is called Neoishiki by rolemusic.

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/
